topic: 5. Which of the following strategic issues needs to be addressed in a successful software testing process?
options: conduct formal technical reviews prior to testing
specify requirements in a quantifiable manner
wait till code is written prior to writing the test plan
topic_cn: 5. 在成功的软件测试过程中，以下哪些战略性问题需要被解决？
options_cn: 在测试之前进行正式的技术评审
以可量化的方式规定需求
等到代码编写完成后再编写测试计划
